title: Should:
body: Riot give the option for Diamond / Master / Challenger (end of season ofc) to CHOOSE their victorious skin, rather than getting Victorious Morgana.

replies.body:
Sure if it was to vote for the Victorious skin from a shortlist of impactful champions then maybe.

However if you mean that every champion could possibilt have a Victorious skin then no. First, as other people has stated, it goes against the idea of the skin being about the most impactful champion of the season. Second is the amount of work Riot would have to commit to making a victorious skin for every champion, a massive task.

Well okay, if the (input region here) were to vote for a skin, then that'd be the victorious skin for the season.
That sounds fair enough

The Victorious skin is aimed at showcasing that summoner X was Victorious for that season. If what you're implying is being able to choose from all victorious skins including from previous seasons that makes the point of the skin mute. Being able to choose to receive Victorious Jarvan IV this season as opposed to the skin proposed by Riot would make the achievement of having the skin by players who earned it through playing in Season 1 at a high level mute.

My point is that Summoner X should be allowed to choose from any skin, (varying what rank they are at the end of the season), that way they're more determined to get to a specific rank or they feel more rewarded, in the end making Summoner X more VICTORIOUS.
no, and the victorious skin changes each season.
